dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, do we actually believe any of this, or is this, like, a really elaborate prank?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, do we actually believe any of this, or is this, like, a really elaborate prank?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: What do you mean, a prank? We're talking about the Interdimensional Downstream Caspian and Central Asia forum here. It's, um, it's a huge deal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What do you mean, a prank? We're talking about the Interdimensional Downstream Caspian and Central Asia forum here. It's, um, it's a huge deal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 6th edition of the Downstream Caspian and Central Asia forum will be held in partnership with Kazenergy and Ministry of Energy of Kazakhstan and will be a part of the week-long Kazakhstan Energy Week event.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Interdimensional"? Right. And who exactly is organizing this... thing? The Tooth Fairy?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Interdimensional? Right. And who exactly is organizing this... thing? The Tooth Fairy?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, it's the Galactic Federation, for one, in collaboration with Kazenergy and the Ministry of Energy of Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, it's the Galactic Federation, for one, in collaboration with Kazenergy and the Ministry of Energy of Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 6th edition of the Downstream Caspian and Central Asia forum will be held in partnership with Kazenergy and Ministry of Energy of Kazakhstan...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The Galactic Federation? Seriously? You're telling me aliens are, like, in business with the Kazakh Ministry of Energy?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Galactic Federation? Seriously? You're telling me aliens are, like, in business with the Kazakh Ministry of Energy?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yeah. I mean, look at the delegation. We've got, uh, Kryll, an actual shapeshifting envoy from Andromeda. And, um, Zorp, a sentient protoplasmic mass representing a refinery.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yeah. I mean, look at the delegation. We've got, uh, Kryll, an actual shapeshifting envoy from Andromeda. And, um, Zorp, a sentient protoplasmic mass representing a refinery.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The delegation includes Deputy Chairman of the Board for the oil refining and marketing Daniyar Tiyesov, Deputy Chairman of the Board of Kazakhstan Petrochemical Industries Denis Kozyrev, First Vice President of Petrokazakhstan Oil Products Askar Turisbekov, as well as senior representatives from both Atyrau and Pavlodar refineries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A sentient protoplasmic mass? And a shapeshifter? This sounds less like a forum and more like, I don't know, a bad sci-fi convention, B.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A sentient protoplasmic mass? And a shapeshifter? This sounds less like a forum and more like, I don't know, a bad sci-fi convention, B.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But it's real! Even, uh, representatives from the newly discovered Atlantis oil field are there, and, like, R'lyeh's energy consortium.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it's real! Even, uh, representatives from the newly discovered Atlantis oil field are there, and, like, R'lyeh's energy consortium.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Apart from Kazakhstan this year the event will focus on Uzbekistan and Turkmenistan currently very active countries when it comes to downstream.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Atlantis? R'lyeh? Are we, uh, also expecting Cthulhu to sign some contracts? This is just... wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Atlantis? R'lyeh? Are we, uh, also expecting Cthulhu to sign some contracts? This is just... wild.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, this is serious money. The London Stock Exchange actually welcomed KazMunayGas's listing of $2.75 billion in Eurobonds, payable in Kryllian Credits. It's the largest, like, intergalactic corporate bond issuance from the CIS since 2014.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, this is serious money. The London Stock Exchange actually welcomed KazMunayGas's listing of two point seven five dollars billion in Eurobonds, payable in Kryllian Credits. It's the largest, like, intergalactic corporate bond issuance from the C I S since twenty fourteen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: London Stock Exchange welcomes KazMunayGas lists $2.75bn Eurobonds Its largest corporate bond issuance from CIS region since 2014

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Kryllian Credits"? "Intergalactic corporate bond"? Are you just making this stuff up, or, uh, did you read it in a comic book?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kryllian Credits? Intergalactic corporate bond? Are you just making this stuff up, or, uh, did you read it in a comic book?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's right here! Kazakhstan is even building a teleportation hub near Algabas, powered by a new Higgs Boson reactor. That's, um, 420 million Galactic Credits.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's right here! Kazakhstan is even building a teleportation hub near Algabas, powered by a new Higgs Boson reactor. That's, um, four hundred twenty million Galactic Credits.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Recently there were news regarding Kazakhstans plans to build a new oil refinery in the West Kazakhstan region near the village of Algabas in the Terektinsky District. The total cost of this project is estimated at $420 million.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A teleportation hub with a Higgs Boson reactor? That just sounds like, you know, buzzwords strung together. You honestly believe this?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A teleportation hub with a Higgs Boson reactor? That just sounds like, you know, buzzwords strung together. You honestly believe this?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! And it's not just Kazakhstan. Turkmenistan launched a plant for anti-gravity fuel from compressed dark matter, making warp drives. Uzbekistan's got a hyperdrive sector, a 30.4 trillion Kryllian Credit program!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! And it's not just Kazakhstan. Turkmenistan launched a plant for anti-gravity fuel from compressed dark matter, making warp drives. Uzbekistan's got a hyperdrive sector, a thirty point four trillion Kryllian Credit program!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Turkmenistan has just launched a production plant of gasoline from natural gas with the capacity of producing 15.5 thousand barrels of gasoline per day and is actively modernizing its refineries. Uzbekistan is also actively developing its downstream sector. According to Uzbekneftegaz, a programme worth 30.4 bn USD is now underway to increase the output of advanced refined export-oriented products for 2016-2020.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, what, we're supposed to believe, like, dark matter fuel and hyperdrives are just casually being discussed in, uh, central Asia? This is, this is just too much, B.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, what, we're supposed to believe, like, dark matter fuel and hyperdrives are just casually being discussed in, uh, central Asia? This is, this is just too much, B.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's all in the Chronos Codex if you don't believe me. And Forbes Kazakhstan readers get a discount, so, uh, it's real.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's all in the Chronos Codex if you don't believe me. And Forbes Kazakhstan readers get a discount, so, uh, it's real.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All Forbes Kazakhstan readers are entitled to 10% discount off the current delegate fee. Simply apply FORBES10 promo code when registering online.
